I didn't see such a argument in arg_spec, is this `enable512e`? Note you can make aliases in arg_spec if you like to keep the logic. See my comment in the arg spec. Add the arg_spec variable name as alias here:
~~~yaml
512emulation: 
    description:  
    - Should the volume provide 512-byte sector emulation?
    - Required when C(state=present)
    required: false
    aliases: ['enable512e']
~~~
